title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB:
Running the java command results in the following exception:

   Exception in thread 'main' java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: subpackage/Test
EB: The java command should run successfully without throwing any exception.
SR:
Compile the 'Test.java' file using the command:

   ajc -d . subpackage\Test.java

   Then run the java command using the command:

   java subpackage.Test
